name: Meltdown+
description:
You play as a physics-based slime and your only control is a dash.  Using your bounciness can make navigation less frantic, but also more unpredictable.  Deciding when to take control is a big part of this game.  

An expansion on my team's submission for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam, Meltdown+ refines levels, expands on things that were rushed in the original, and eventually aims to add a second campaign full of new mechanics and environments.  Basically, we're continuing the project outside of the jam, doing things that weren't possible with the time limit.

Everything but the menu features controller support.  Check out the original here: https://boombox5.itch.io/meltdown-out-of-control
